long_description: Don't risk cutting yourself when reaching into your toiletry kit for your razor-use razor covers from Coghlan's to protect blades and fingers. Ideal for traveling, camping or anytime your razor is away from your own shower. Fits most safety razors. Cover is large enough to also store extra blades inside. Package contains two razor covers.
short_description: Don't risk cutting yourself when reaching into your toiletry kit for your razor-use razor covers from Coghlan's to protect blades and fingers.
